Dwarka; New Delhi-110075 th No: NHAVi104L/199/2006-Admn: 11 September, 2006 OFHCE ORDER Consequent upon approval of the Competent Authority and a8 a part of institutional strengthening of the Authority, a "Project Appraisal Cell" is hereby created 2 Functions: To undertake comprehensive project appraisal of all PPP projects While the basic financial appraisal would continue to be done by external financiai consultants, this Cell would critically examine the appraisals done, particularly with regard to estimates Of toll revenue flows,  estimation of costs and financial viability 'jii) To advise the Authority o the BOT formats to be adopted with related financial modelling 3 Composition: Nameo the post Nuber gpost Financial Analyst (rank of CGM) wili head the Cell Transport Economist (rank of GM) 1 ( Transport Planner (rank of GM) 1 iv) DGM (Finance) 1 Legal Officer (rank of DGM) 1 6v DGM (Technical) 1 (vii) Manager (Finance) 2 4 The Cell will be located under Merber (T) IP and will directly report to him In urdel iu Ilake ihis: Ceii [unciiunal, ihe fullowing   ofiicers wiii  iouk afer   the functioning of the Cell in addition to their present responsibilities; till further orders.
